Good old times when i played this game for the first time. I had 5 years old when i tried this game for the first time. As you know, this game is a modification of Half-Life by developers and it's a multiplayer first-person shooter. You don't have iron sight how you have in CoD or other shooter games + you need to know the weapons because they don't shoot where is the aim. It's hard to explain, but this game has so many modes and is awesome because if you buy this game, you will receive Counter-Strike Condition Zero and Condition Zero Deleted Scenes for FREE. You can play a normal shooter games with instant respawn or without it, but you can also play deathrun, surf, bhop, gun game, zombies and so on.

Pros:
+The multiplayer is great
+The sound is good
+The graphics are very good for that year
+So many play styles
+So many maps
+The gameplay is hard but great

Cons:
-Hackers
-Players who will destroy your game
-Kids
-VIP Servers who will OBLIGATE you to enter on their servers

This game reminded me how was the life when i was younger, so many hours in the front of PC, how i played it with friends and at school, how i pissed off for the first time in a game and so on. (10/10)

Recuerdo que jugaba Cs desde muy pequeño en un cyber cerca de mi casa, siempre que podia jugar este juego era mi elección; cuando estudiaba en el colegio podia jugarlo modo lan con amigos, que tiempos; nos escapabamos de clase para irnos a jugar. Nunca dejará de ser un gran juego; ya tengo 20 años y este sigue siendo mi preferencia a pesar de los modernos juegos que salen dia a dia. Gran juego que no pasara de moda♥♥♥
Still hackers can play this game unluckly ^^

Over 1K hours of gameplay and I loved every single moment of it.
Started out hard, getting used to the mechanics, recoil patterns and playing with strategy, but then along the time it got easier and easier.
Playing online was a challenge for me, good thing is I learned tricks with people and received tons of tips on how to play better.
Made tons of friends and played in many communities, too bad most people left for CS:GO and left this game.
Realmente que me tirou muitas horas e foi mt divertido, ia para lan de gerson jogar com eberaldo, pato roco, ze bokaia, checheu, bob esponja e todos
Можно и пострелять и поголове наполучать)
Według mnie najlepsza wersja tej gry. Polecam.

Итак, игра просто шедевр. Это и так все знают, поэтому я просто оставлю здесь рецепт для домашнего оливье:

Ингредиенты                                           10 порций
Картофель	                                        7 штук
Морковь	                                                5 штук
Маринованные огурцы	                        6 штук
Консервированный зеленый горошек  	1 банка
Яйцо куриное	                                        6 штук
Докторская колбаса                           	300 г
Сметана                                            	100 г
Майонез	                                                200 г
Соль	по вкусу

Инструкция
 1 час

1.  Отварить картофель, морковь и яйца.
2.  Все нарезать мелкими кубиками.
3.  Все перемешать и заправить майонезом и сметаной.

çok ilginç devinimlerle oyuncular deli deli hareket edip vurulmamayı öğrenmişti.
hele o rehineler az mı çekti elimizden %100 canından %1 e indirirdik bıçakla sonrada bombalardık evet çok masumduk.
